videos.description: Michigan gets on the board early as Blake Corum hauls in a pass and gets into the end zone for a touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Blake Corum takes the swing pass 14 yards for Michigan's opening TD) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Corum takes the swing pass 14 yards for Michigan's opening TD

videos.description: Ronnie Bell makes amazing one-handed catch on the sideline, but it's taken away because of offensive pass interference.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Incredible one-handed Michigan catch nullified by pass interference) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Incredible one-handed Michigan catch nullified by pass interference

videos.description: Ronnie Bell goes deep and Cade McNamara drops it right to him for a 76-yard Michigan touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Ronnie Bell goes right by Western Michigan for 76-yard TD) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ronnie Bell goes right by Western Michigan for 76-yard TD

videos.description: Michigan's Ronnie Bell has a nice punt return, but is tackled awkwardly on his lower body and is helped off the field.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Ronnie Bell suffers lower body injury on punt return) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ronnie Bell suffers lower body injury on punt return

videos.description: Michigan extends its lead as Hassan Haskins gets into the end zone from 21 yards out.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Hassan Haskins bursts through the hole for a Michigan TD) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hassan Haskins bursts through the hole for a Michigan TD

videos.description: Michigan running back Hassan Haskins gets close to the first-down marker as he hurdles a defender.
videos.headline: Michigan's Haskins hurdles defender

videos.description: Michigan's A.J. Henning takes the end around and flies down the sideline for the 74-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (A.J. Henning takes off for 74-yard TD run) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: A.J. Henning takes off for 74-yard TD run

videos.description: Michigan running back Blake Corum bounces off tacklers in the hole, then bursts to the end zone for the 30-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Blake Corum bounces off a tackle and speeds to the end zone for a TD) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Corum bounces off a tackle and speeds to the end zone for a TD

videos.description: Michigan shows out as quarterback J.J. McCarthy avoids the rush then chucks it downfield to Daylen Baldwin for the 69-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (McCarthy heaves it up for a 69-yard TD to Daylen Baldwin) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: McCarthy heaves it up for a 69-yard TD to Daylen Baldwin

videos.description: Western Michigan Broncos vs. Michigan Wolverines: Full Highlights

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Western Michigan Broncos vs. Michigan Wolverines: Full Highlights) 2021/09/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Western Michigan Broncos vs. Michigan Wolverines: Full Highlights
